Action.author: christopherferris
Action.body: It would be helpful to explain what 'uber chaincode' is, exactly. is there a one-pager that describes the proposed feature? That would seem in order.

Action.author: mastersingh24
Action.body: I don't think this makes any sense to have as an item. We should be describing what feature / functionality we are trying to provide

Action.author: christopherferris
Action.body: closing as this just seems abandoned.
